thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com | 4 of 113
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I ordered four expandable stem casters. The casters are high quality, much more than I expected. They came well packaged and arrived ahead of schedule. I was constructing an iron-pipe table. I am not mechanically inclined and tend to hurt myself with tools. Just the same, I wanted to be able to roll the table around and these casters are perfect. The only shortcoming with this product was having to learn how they operated so that I could install them properly. After several attempts, I was able to install the casters securely and they work very well.
NOTE: It would be useful to include some handy directions for those of us that are mechanically challenged!
